<SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">

      <air:AirFareRulesRsp TransactionId="9C1725EE0A07643B096D7BC3ABEB5678" ResponseTime="9300" xmlns:air="http://www.travelport.com/schema/air_v50_0" xmlns:common_v50_0="http://www.travelport.com/schema/common_v50_0">
         <common_v50_0:ResponseMessage Code="0" Type="Warning" ProviderCode="1G">FARES LAST UPDATED 16JAN 23:20 P</common_v50_0:ResponseMessage>
         <common_v50_0:ResponseMessage Code="0" Type="Warning" ProviderCode="1G">DEPART 12MAR                      AIRPORT FARES</common_v50_0:ResponseMessage>
         <common_v50_0:ResponseMessage Code="0" Type="Warning" ProviderCode="1G">**ADDITIONAL TAXES/FEES MAY APPLY**</common_v50_0:ResponseMessage>
         <common_v50_0:ResponseMessage Code="0" Type="Warning" ProviderCode="1G">PUBLIC/PRIVATE FARES FOR 80EZ</common_v50_0:ResponseMessage>
         <common_v50_0:ResponseMessage Code="0" Type="Warning" ProviderCode="1G">U.S. PASSENGER FACILITY CHARGES MAY APPLY</common_v50_0:ResponseMessage>
         <common_v50_0:ResponseMessage Code="0" Type="Warning" ProviderCode="1G">TAXES AND FEES MAY VARY DEPENDING ON THE BOOKED ITINERARY</common_v50_0:ResponseMessage>
         <common_v50_0:ResponseMessage Code="0" Type="Warning" ProviderCode="1G">USD     FARE         MIN/   XL  TVL DATES    TKT DATES</common_v50_0:ResponseMessage>
         <common_v50_0:ResponseMessage Code="0" Type="Warning" ProviderCode="1G">CX  FARE    BASIS    AP    MAX  FE  FIRST/LAST   FIRST/LAST</common_v50_0:ResponseMessage>
         <common_v50_0:ResponseMessage Code="0" Type="Warning" ProviderCode="1G">OTHER FARES EXIST-DO MORE SPECIFIC FD</common_v50_0:ResponseMessage>
         <air:FareRule RuleNumber="0" Source="ATPCO">
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="0" Type="RULE">RULE - 011/2020
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
ONE WAY TRIP FARES
 APPLICATION
   CLASS OF SERVICE
     THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
   TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
     FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
     ONE-WAY JOURNEYS.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="5" Type="RULE">FOR -3 TYPE FARES
  RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE REQUIRED BY MIDNIGHT 3
  DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE.
  WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
  TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 24 HOURS AFTER
  RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="8" Type="RULE">UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  STOPOVERS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT.
     NO STOPOVER OCCURS IF PASSENGER TAKES NEXT AVAILABLE
      FLIGHT WITHIN 8 HOURS.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="10" Type="RULE">UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
   DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/MULTI-COMPONENT CIRCLE TRIPS NOT
   PERMITTED.
   APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
   MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
  OPEN JAWS/2-COMPONENT CIRCLE TRIPS
    FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS WITH NK
    FARES IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF.
    -TO FORM SINGLE OPEN JAWS
    -TO FORM 2-COMPONENT CIRCLE TRIPS
    OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS NOTE -
      THE MOST RESTRICTIVE CONDITIONS APPLY INCLUDING
      MIN/MAX STAY/RESERVATIONS AND TICKETING
      REQUIREMENTS/PENALTIES OR SERVICE CHARGES.  OPEN
      JAW PERMITTED AS LONG AS RETURN IS TO ORIGINAL
      DEPARTING CITY.
  END-ON-END
    END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED WITH NK DOMESTIC/
    INTERNATIONAL FARES. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. SIDE
    TRIPS PERMITTED.
   PROVIDED -
     COMBINATIONS ARE FOR CARRIER NK IN ANY RULE IN ANY
      TARIFF.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="11" Type="RULE">UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED ON 01MAR 20 OR 06MAR 20 THROUGH
  08MAR 20 OR 12MAR 20 THROUGH 15MAR 20 OR 19MAR 20 THROUGH
  23MAR 20 OR 26MAR 20 THROUGH 29MAR 20.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="12" Type="RULE">FOR G- TYPE FARES
  IF INFANT UNDER 02 WITHOUT A SEAT.
    THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL.
  OTHERWISE
    THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL PER FARE COMPONENT.
FOR G- TYPE FARES
  IF INFANT UNDER 02 WITHOUT A SEAT.
    THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL.
  OTHERWISE
    A SURCHARGE OF USD 21.39 PER COUPON WILL BE ADDED TO THE
    APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.
         NOTE -
          PUF-PASSENGER USAGE FEE
    AND - A SURCHARGE OF USD 4.65 PER COUPON WILL BE ADDED
          TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.
         NOTE -
          EF - EXCHANGE FEE</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="14" Type="RULE">UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TRAVEL ON THIS FARE COMPONENT MUST COMMENCE BY MIDNIGHT ON
  30MAR 20.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="15" Type="RULE">UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TICKETS MAY BE ISSUED BY MAIL/PTA. PTA DOES NOT CONSTITUTE
  TICKETING.
         NOTE -
          NONREFUNDABLE CHARGE OF USD 25.00 WILL BE ASSESSED
          FOR PTAS.
          PASSENGERS SUBJECT TO PHOTO ID AT TIME OF FLIGHT
          CHECK-IN.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
         NOTE -
          EXTENSION OF TICKET VALIDITY PERMITTED UNDER
          GUIDELINES SET FORTH BY CARRIER.  CONTACT
          CARRIER FOR DETAILS.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="16" Type="RULE">UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  CHANGES
    ANY TIME
      CHARGE USD 100.00 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION.
         NOTE -
          1.   CHANGES PERMITTED TWENTY-FOUR /24/ HOURS OR
               MORE IN ADVANCE OF COMMENCING TRAVEL PROVIDED
               THE NEW ITINERARY MEETS ALL THE PROVISIONS OF
               ADVANCE RESERVATIONS AND TICKET PURCHASE AND
               MIN/MAX STAY REQUIREMENTS OF THE ORIGINAL
               FARE.
          2.   THE NEW ITINERARY IS OF EQUAL OR GREATER
               VALUE. NOTE...THE FULL VALUE OF AN EXISTING
               TICKET MAY BE APPLIED TO AN ITINERARY OF
               LOWER VALUE HOWEVER NO REFUND WILL APPLY.
          3.   A SERVICE FEE OF USD 100.00 FOR
               ALLOWABLE CHANGES PLUS DIFFERENCE BETWEEN
               ORIGINAL FARE AND NEW FARE.
          4.   PASSENGER USAGE FEE OF USD 20.99 PER
               PASSENGER ONE-WAY IS NON-REFUNDABLE AND
               WILL BE AN ADDITIONAL PENALTY TO THE PER
               PASSENGER CANCEL/CHANGE/MODIFICATION FEE OF
               USD 100.00 FOR TRANSACTIONS MADE VIA THE GDS.
  CANCELLATIONS
    ANY TIME
      TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE.
      WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER.
         NOTE -
          WAIVER ALSO APPLIES TO TRAVELING COMPANION.
          IN THE EVENT OF DEATH OF PASSENGER OR TRAVELING
          COMPANION A SERVICE CHARGE OF USD 110.00
          WILL BE ASSESSED IN ORDER TO PROCESS REFUND.
          CANCELLATIONS MUST BE MADE 24 HOURS PRIOR TO
          ORIGINAL DEPARTURE OR TICKET BECOMES UNCHANGEABLE
          AND ENTIRE VALUE OF TICKET IS LOST.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="18" Type="RULE">UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THE ORIGINAL TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - NONREF/NONTRANS/
  VALID NK - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="19" Type="RULE">UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - NO CHARGE
    MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT
      BY ADULT
  OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-14 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE
         FARE PLUS USD 100.00.
         NOTE -
          100.00 USD SERVICE FEE EACH WAY.</air:FareRuleLong>
            <air:FareRuleLong Category="22" Type="RULE">UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
         NOTE -
          NO OTHER DISCOUNTS APPLY.</air:FareRuleLong>
         </air:FareRule>
      </air:AirFareRulesRsp>
   </SOAP:Body>
</SOAP:Envelope>
